channel.title: [Pi] adding new equipment slots
channel.description: I thought of an idea and thought maybe i can do it. So i thought of adding auras/tails/some other things. But i wanted that those things go into slots. So that people would look cooler and stuff. So. How can i add more equipment slots? What's the client/server sided work is needed? Any tutorials at adding aura slots? Thank you.
